import React from 'react'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { startLogin } from '../../actions/auth'; import { useForm } from '../../hooks/useForm'; import './login.css'; export const LoginScreen = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [formLoginValues, handleLoginInputChange] = useForm({ lEmail: 'cloudluis22@hotmail.com', lPassword: 'ultraluis23' }); const [formRegisterValues, handleRegisterInputChange] = useForm({ rName: 'Isaac', rEmail: 'isaaco320@hotmail.com', rPassword: '123456' }); const { lEmail, lPassword } = formLoginValues const handleLogin = (evt) => { evt.preventDefault(); dispatch( startLogin(lEmail, lPassword) ); }; return (
